name: Flower Secret
description:
Description

A little game about a guy who found a strange flower with a letter near it. He was interested in the letter's content. From here on his adventure begins. You need to help him to finish this adventure.

Controls Keyboard:
  • A, D or <-, -> to move
  • Space to jump/skip dialogs
  • E to drop/pick up flower
Changelog Version 1.1:
  • Fix various typos
  • Improve movement
